concept.title: Managing Sametime app settings
concept.shortdesc: You can configure settings for the HCL Sametime app on your mobile device. Settings persist on the server so the server maintains the settings on installations and other mobile devices.

conbody.p:
From the app menu, tap Settings to display the application settings. Access settings under the following categories:
General
Contact
Chat
Meetings
Notifications
Troubleshooting

row.entry: Contains the Sametime server connection information required to connect to the host sever. Settings include the host server URL, port, security, connection type, and log in credentials.
With this setting set to on, after you configure the app, the app automatically logs in whenever the app starts from the application icon.
Set the length of time you want to remain online when you put the app in the background.
Set whether to show offline contacts in your contact list.
Turn on to display a time stamp with a chat message.
Display system messages related to the chat. Such as when a chat partner closes the chat.

dlentry.dd: Turn on to participate in a meeting with audio only.
Indicates the whether your audio device is on or off when you join a meeting. When turned off, the mute icon displays at the bottom of the meeting window.
Indicates the whether your video camera is on or off when you join a meeting. When turned off, the no camera icon displays at the bottom of the meeting window.

row.entry: Select to answer call or open conversation.

These preferences determine meeting behavior when you aren't on a wifi connection.
Stream over WiFi only Enable to join a meeting in audio-only mode. You cannot see videos. However, you can see presentations.
Download over WiFi only Enable to download meeting recording over wifi only.
Playback over WiFi only Enable to play a meeting recording over wifi only.
Using these features when not on a WiFi connections might incur fees by your provider. The default preferences are join a meeting in audio-only mode, and you not allowed download or play meeting recordings.
Allow sound and vibration versus deliver quietly
Turn on and off showing of badges.
Tap to expand the notification categories. For each category, you can turn off and on receiving notifications.
Turn on and off trace logging. When turned on, the device speed and battery is affected.
